'''Tolkien 2005: The Ring Goes Ever On''' was a convention hosted by [[The Tolkien Society]] in conjunction with the [[Mythopoeic Society]]. It was held at Aston University (Birmingham, England) [[11 August|11]]-[[15 August]], [[2005]]. The convention marked the fiftieth anniversary of the complete publication of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
